description: Our old KF-15 fighters will no longer be useful in a few years. A pressure from military arise and we should consider options to replace them. Thankfully, there are a couple of alternatives available, namely importing Matheuchelles' fighters which are a proven quality, a joint venture with Foreberg to design and produce our own new KF-17 or just producing more KF-16.

options.description: Development of our arms industry is the most important - let's design KF-17.
Why should we waste time and money while we can get Matheuchelles' fighters?
Producing KF-16 will be the cheapest and most sensible option. Quantity is more important.

title: Military deal
